string-array.name: steps_descriptions
string-array.item: First mount the convex lens in a distance of 2 cm in front of the scope. Then mount the concave lens 10 cm in front of the convex lens. Then mount the phone 5 cm in front of the concave lens. Adjust the phone position until the image is completely sharp.
Mount the button in the opposite side of your shooting hang. Connect the cable in the audio plug.
Press in the menu the zero POI button and follow the instructions.
Press in the menu the Practice button and start shooting!
